channel.title: Covid 19 on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Covid 19 on Mark Needham

item.title: QuickGraph #6: COVID-19 Taxonomy Graph
item.description: It’s been several months since our last QuickGraph and the world feels very different than it was back then. I’ve been reading a couple of books about viruses - Spillover and Pale Rider - and am now very curious to learn more about the medical terms reference in the books. With the Pre Release of neosemantics (n10s) for Neo4j 4.0, I thought it would be interesting to create a graph of the taxonomy of the virus that caused COVID-19, using data extracted from Wikidata’s SPARQL API.
